message.body: Evangelists :: evil's agents. Not backwards, but it is a creepy Antigram I found.
Lewis Carroll called a word that meant other things when spelled backwards a 'senordnilap,' which is palindromes in reverse.
Yay! Which ones does he use?
Wanna come to a shabbatluck tonight at 630 at my friend becca's? They are super lovely and secular, ive been going every week
